column5: "Why hello there. I'm a busy women so I do hope you are contacting me for a good reason"

column4:
SetTooltip tahlan_startTurnInSilvys "You do not have any blueprints in your possession."
SetEnabled tahlan_startTurnInSilvys false

column6: 1:tahlan_silvysContactOption:"I was told your department offers lucrative work."
15:tahlan_startTurnInSilvys:"I heard you might be interested in recovered blueprints."
100:tahlan_neverMindSilvys:"Oh I'm sorry, I don't actually have any."

column5: "Memory getting hazy already? Do take care with that."
"Indeed. My department is always all too thankful for such contributions to our efforts."

"You are correct. Due to the STDF's strictly defensive mission statement, I am forced to rely on independent contractors to get work done in the sector beyond this system. Plausible deniability and all that.

According to what we have on record about you, you should fit right in. Feel free to inquire about open contracts at any time when in system."
$personLastName moves the conversation on to other matters. "Anything else you need?"
